titleStmt.title: Angliæ speculum a glass that flatters not : presented to a country congregation at the late solemn fast, April 24, 1678, in a parallel between the kingdom of Israel and England, wherein the whole nation is desired to behold and consider our sin and our danger / by a dutiful son of this church.
titleStmt.author: Patrick, Simon, 1626-1707.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to Patrick Simon.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
